summary: Tested Lab page scrolling fix. Strategy tab scrolling now works correctly - 'For Future Games Like This' section is fully accessible. All requested features verified working: tab switching, move navigation, move list clicking.

strategy_tab_scrolling.details: Content height: 2122px, Visible: 895px. Scrolled to bottom successfully. 'For Future Games Like This' section is visible and accessible at bbox x:1116, y:626, width:204, height:24

tab_switching.details: Successfully switched between Summary, Strategy, and Mistakes tabs

move_navigation_controls.details: Play, forward, back, flip board buttons all work correctly. Board flipped from black to white perspective.

move_list_clicking.details: Clicking moves in move list updates board position with yellow highlight on last move squares. Move 'Nc3' clicked, board showed position correctly.

scrolling_fix_verification.fix_applied: Added min-h-0 to Tabs container (line 612) and wrapped ScrollArea in div with flex-1 min-h-0 overflow-hidden (line 626-627)
scrolling_fix_verification.before_fix: Content at bottom of Strategy tab (like 'For Future Games Like This') was not scrollable/visible
scrolling_fix_verification.after_fix: All content is now scrollable. Verified scroll area has scrollHeight 2122px > clientHeight 895px, and scrolled to position 1227px to view 'For Future Games Like This'

context_for_next_testing_agent: Strategy tab scrolling bug has been fixed. The fix involved adding min-h-0 CSS property to flex containers to allow proper scroll behavior. Lab page now has fully functional three-tab interface with scrollable content in all tabs.
screenshots_taken: summary_tab.png - Summary tab with Core Lesson and The Fix sections
strategy_tab_top.png - Strategy tab showing Opening and Pawn Structure sections
strategy_scrolled_future_games.png - Strategy tab scrolled to show 'For Future Games Like This' section
mistakes_tab.png - Mistakes tab showing 'No significant mistakes'
after_forward.png - Board after forward navigation with highlighted d5 move
after_controls.png - Board after flip (black perspective), showing exd5 position
after_move_click.png - Board after clicking Nc3 in move list
